game_description: Race against other players in this Physics filled platformer obstacle course known as MarathRUN! This demo has 7 available Arenas where you get to compete against 5 people to see who will get the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd place! This physics enabled game will make you feel like you are actually in the game and any forces you receives will push you away!
